website_summaries.verdict: Cover all your bases with this set of 3 stainless steel spoons.
pros: Useful for a wide variety of cocktail and drink mixing
The flat top muddler is a useful accessory
cons: Not heavy duty, so may be a little too lightweight for serious mixologists

customer_reviews.title: You Complete Me
customer_reviews.text: After years of mocking my mother's spoon collection, I now understand. These spoons have filled a hole in my soul. Let's face it, nobody is drinking out of old fashioned whiskey glasses anymore, those plastic stir sticks aren't cutting it. This is for the "I save Big Buddy's specifically for Martini Monday, Tequila Tuesday, Whiskey Wednesday, 30-pack Thursday, and Fireball Friday" gang (Dilly, Dilly). And for those of you Not-so-early-birds, they also work wonderfully for stirring coffee thermoses (whether it's a creamer or a Bailey's kind of day). No stains on these - unlike the multiple dinner spoons I've wrecked on coffee.
customer_reviews.author: BTV

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: When building a home bar, these 3 bar spoons are just right. I added these with the Hiware Thick bottom mixing glass, they go together like peas and carrots.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbystick

customer_reviews.title: They work & don't stain
customer_reviews.text: These cocktail spoons do exactly what they are intended to do. They allow stirring with minimal spilling and do not stain. I run them through my dishwasher with either Finish or Cascade dishwasher pods and they clean up easily. I would recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: wineteam

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The package came with a stick-on name plate that was not attached. It had come loose in shipping or packaging. The original engraved name on the stand is Coca-Cola. It is not what was advertised. They used a left over stand that was not sold using the coca-cola. Would not recommend buying from this company again, using re-purposed material and sold as something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW BEST FRIENDS!
customer_reviews.text: I just wanted a long stirring spoon. I found this set on Amazon and since it was a good price, decided to purchase these spoons. When the set arrived I was IMPRESSED! Very sturdy, strong thick metal. Doesn't feel cheap or flimsy. Cute spiral pattern which helps to provide a good grip on them. One of the spoons can even stand up on it's own! I can now stir my iced coffee concoctions like a PRO! I have used at least one of them every day. A quick wash and ready to use again. I am so pleased with the purchase of this set of spoons!
customer_reviews.author: BTDoxies

customer_reviews.title: Long & Strong
customer_reviews.text: Super long & durable. Has a good weight on it as I’ve had much cheaper ones that are lighter which makes mixing faster, but it’s easy to bend & deform, which doesn’t happen with these spoons. Perfect for mixing all kinds of drinks in all kinds of cups, except for tiny cups probably.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Y.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic bar tool
customer_reviews.text: These are great for mixing drinks without having to worry about slops and spills due to ice in the glass. Just spin between your fingers - the spiraled handles are perfect for that. I also like to use them to stir coffee with water in my french press.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wing

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic set. Whether you're a pro trying to build your bag or a domestic cocktailian this is is a great starter. I've been using them for over a week and they've served their purpose very well. In complete honesty, I prefer a heavier spoon for most purposes but considering I received the set for half the cost of some of my spoons it is very hard to argue.
customer_reviews.author: cocktailconcoctor

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I didnt think I needed all three but the price was right and I find myself using all three of them regularly. I'm not a pro but their very nice
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice, great pricing for what you get. I love that each spoon has a different end for multiple different uses. Will be great for mixing drinks in a large cup/pitcher. Please check the dimensions as this wouldn't work as well for mixing in small cocktail glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Lubica Brown

customer_reviews.title: A bar must have!
customer_reviews.text: A must have these are. One for cherries, another for olives without having to rinse while making multiple cocktails. And the one with the flat top makes a great fruit or mint muddled.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Weedy

customer_reviews.title: Lovem
customer_reviews.text: I live on tea and honey lots of various types of honey and some of them are very thick and hard to get out of the glass jars that's why I bought these spoons they reach into my long mug they reach into the long jars and they're just perfect for stirring, the handle is comfortable I just love them they are perfect long stirring spoons and their adorable! I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hex

customer_reviews.title: Works Great for Stirring my espresso drink
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our kitchen at home for stirring coffee drinks all of the time. They hold up in the dishwasher and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons for stirring cocktails.
customer_reviews.text: These Hiware stirring spoon are great! I use them for stirring cocktails when bartending, so they are in use for hours at a time. Long enough to go to the bottom of any tall glassware used at a bar, thin so that they slide through the ice with ease and strong enough to do the job without bending.
customer_reviews.author: San Fran Ron

customer_reviews.title: Good quality spoons
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are functional and beautiful. The spoon head is a little smaller than the cheaper bar spoons I've used but it's not an issue just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: S P

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: The spoons are long and seem to be quite sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Taiskii

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: The spoons were as described and actually much nicer than expected for the price. I could not find this product at any local retail store and was very pleased with the quality and the expedited shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Nana

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and clean very easy, never stain.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I use these to stir my vegetable juices when I make a big batch and the pitcher is deep. They don't stain and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Rikster

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Standard issue bar tools. Built well, sturdy, easy to clean. Would buy set again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Thank you so much for selling these wonderful spoons!
customer_reviews.text: Finally!! we can stir our Bloody Marias!! Thank you so much for selling these wonderful spoons!!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Moniot

customer_reviews.title: Sent only two spoons in the package
customer_reviews.text: There were only two spoons in the package. The bag was sealed and the two spoons in the package were fine, but why was one missing?
customer_reviews.author: F. B. Duchene

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: The spoons came in a timely manner and work well for what they are needed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlisa Wahtomy-Alba

customer_reviews.title: Wish it could have stuck to my bamboo magnet
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these were not magnetic but otherwise a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Augustine Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good Bar Spoons
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Feels comfortable in your hand with no sharp edges on the spirals.
customer_reviews.author: HARRISON

customer_reviews.title: A perfect addition to my bar.
customer_reviews.text: I was hosting a cocktail party and in taking and in surveying what I had in my bar, I found that I was missing the bar style stirring spoons. These spoons worked beautifully with my new mixing glasses that I also purchased from Amazon. The Negronis, Vespers, Martinis, Old Fashioneds came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me... Husband is happy!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy, I still don't fully understand the usefulness of the different tops. He assures me they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura D.

customer_reviews.title: Spoon work great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. They work very well for stiring cocktails. Clean easily.
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Something here doesn’t belong...
customer_reviews.text: Two of the spoons are as pictured, the third is totally different. Rough steel edges and a red plastic cap on the end. Don’t know if this is normal or not. The round and flat end spoons were as pictured and seem great, the random third one however will just go buried in the back of a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Very long handles perfect for large drinks
customer_reviews.author: L. Mello

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Received these promptly, and find them as described. The shorter one is a little more difficult to stir with than the taller ones, just because of the direction of the handle end. Otherwise, they are very nice!
customer_reviews.author: F R Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Great price for the 3 of them. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Silver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted to make special drinks. I can't wait to try the layering technique.
customer_reviews.author: WORLD TRAVELER

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: These are quality spoons at a great price. Not much else to say other than they are good quality and work. They are heavy and not cheap feeling and you are getting 3 spoons for the price of a single spoon at most department and liquor stores so what's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S. Vorpahl

customer_reviews.title: ... bar spoons for my travel kit and these are great! The weighted spoon is great and the muddler ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a few bar spoons for my travel kit and these are great! The weighted spoon is great and the muddler end spoon works In a pinch if I don't have a wooden muddler. They arrived on time and are a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Cerny

customer_reviews.title: Stirring Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes purchases like this seem frivolous but these are well made and very useful in stirring and marking drinks.

customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. Very pleased. Well made and sturdier than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee spoons
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and functional, they made a great gift for the espresso lover in my life.

customer_reviews.title: The packaging was in great condition when it arrived and everything was in it ...
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was in great condition when it arrived and everything was in it that was supposed to be. The company checked in on their product to make sure everything was good with it. I made a few wonderful old fashioneds with it and it worked great.

customer_reviews.text: These are delightful! Long and hefty, these are definitely professional stirring tools. Smart to own, and fun to use!

customer_reviews.text: I like the different lengths, perfect for making single cocktails or a pitcher

customer_reviews.text: Nice set of spoons for home bar use. They seem a little light weight for professional bartending but the narrow shaft makes proper stirring easier for any size hands Very well weighted and pleasant to hold

customer_reviews.title: Every tool imaginable for stirring classic cocktails

customer_reviews.text: The spoons are great quality and beautifully made! I'm excited they got here so quick so I could start using them!

customer_reviews.title: Good spoons, but much lighter and flimsier then expected
customer_reviews.text: Good spoons, but much lighter and flimsier then expected. Not the heavy duty version of bar spoons i have owned in the past. still, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Mine came scratched
customer_reviews.text: The product itself has great content! But mine came with fine scratches across the front cover. My husband's birthday is now two days away and something that I paid for new now looks used. I'm really disappointed. I left packaging feedback as well.
customer_reviews.author: toombs11

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic addition to any bar - perfect for cocktail stirring
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are a perfect addition to any bar, especially if you want to get into classic cocktail making. The three different spoons can be used for different cocktails during a party. The classic is the disk top which is perfect for if you want to sit the spoon upright on a flat surface. The other two have different tops, perfect for not intermingling your alcohol. They are a great length for use with a mixing glass and are awesome for stirring. The metal is of good quality and this is a great set at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stetson and Megan Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: I got these yesterday and for 3 of them it's well worth it. All 3 of them are well made and have some weight to them they feal good in your hand and can move the ice around in a big picher of ice tea with no bending if you know what I mean. They all have a swirl design on them and they don't look cheap so for the price you really can't go wrong. Would definitely recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Man

customer_reviews.title: Great spoons, perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: These spoons are great! Oniously they do exactly what guy expect them to do, but they also beat all the other ones on cost on Amazon! The swirl effect is cool and they're long enough to stir without your fingers getting into your drink! Exactly what we wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Diana N

customer_reviews.title: Functional, attractive, and an excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: These were an attractive addition to my barware and make me feel like a "pro" when mixing cocktails for guests. If you are hesitating to order, don't.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN N.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: They are great drink mixers, easy to clean, and very durable. I would highly recommend, and I would buy this product again if I needed it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift

customer_reviews.title: love the variety.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!

customer_reviews.text: The cocktail spoon were as advertised and even nicer looking than I had expected! Great value for the money!

customer_reviews.text: very nice drink spoon set they seem to be of high quality very reasonable price and delivered quickly. I would highly recommend this set.

customer_reviews.title: Nice mixing spoons, great balance...
customer_reviews.text: Solid addition to anyone’s bar. I’ve not used the muddler spoon for anything but in a pinch I’m sure it’d be fine, I prefer my wooden muddlers. Each of the spoons are well balanced and perform smoothly with a variety of glasses and thermal mugs.

product_meta.title: Hiware Stirring Spoon, Long Handle Mixing Spoon, Stainless Steel Cocktail Spoon, Spiral Pattern Bar Spoon, Cocktail Mixing Spoon, Set of 3
feature_bullets: Made of premium grade 18/10 stainless steel for superb durability and corrosion resistance, easy to clean
Long handle spoons, perfect for mixing drinks, smoothies, malts or milkshakes in tall glass
Different bottom design make it easily be assigned to each glass
An exceptional value and an excellent gift for any occasion
